Texts.Chs: 现在让我们更进一步。建造一个^orange;大型蜂箱^reset;来挖掘蜂园的潜力。你应该多抓一点^green;森林蜂^reset;用来生产建造所需的^orange;金色木材^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Now we can get a bit more adventurous. Create an ^orange;Giant Apiary^reset; to double your bee farm potential. You'll need some ^green;forest bees^reset; to produce the ^orange;Golden Wood^reset; required to build it.

Texts.Chs: 大型蜂箱能够支持^green;两个巢框^reset;，蜜蜂的工作效率将翻倍。
Texts.Eng: These sweet babies can hold ^green;two frames^reset;, and bees work twice as fast within.
